import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const bgImage="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1518609878373-06d740f60d8b?ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2370&q=80";function MediaPlayer(){const mediaPlayerButtonStyles=_ref=>{let{functions:{pxToRem}}=_ref;return{width:pxToRem(46),height:pxToRem(46),minWidth:pxToRem(46),minHeight:pxToRem(46),mr:1};};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{sx:_ref2=>{let{functions:{linearGradient,rgba},palette:{gradients}}=_ref2;return{backgroundImage:`${linearGradient(rgba(gradients.info.main,0.75),rgba(gradients.info.state,0.75))}, url(${bgImage})`,backgroundSize:"cover",backgroundPosition:"center"};},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{p:3,position:"relative",lineHeight:0,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonTypography,{variant:"h5",color:"white",fontWeight:"medium",children:"Some Kind Of Blues"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonTypography,{variant:"button",color:"white",fontWeight:"regular",children:"Deftones"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{display:"flex",mt:6,pt:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Prev",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonButton,{variant:"outlined",size:"large",circular:true,iconOnly:true,sx:mediaPlayerButtonStyles,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{children:"skip_previous"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Pause",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonButton,{variant:"outlined",size:"large",circular:true,iconOnly:true,sx:mediaPlayerButtonStyles,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{children:"play_arrow"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Next",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonButton,{variant:"outlined",size:"large",circular:true,iconOnly:true,sx:mediaPlayerButtonStyles,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{children:"skip_next"})})})]})})]})});}export default MediaPlayer;
